# Missing values

```{r, include=FALSE}
source("srcs/helpers.R")
load(file = "data/processing/imdb_sample.RData")
```

## Missing patterns

```{r}
imdb_sample %>%
  mutate_all(~as.character(.)) %>%
  pivot_longer(1:ncol(.)) %>%
  group_by(name, value) %>%
  summarise(nunique = n()) %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  arrange(-nunique) %>%
  slice(1:15)
```


## Missing plot

```{r,fig.width=11,fig.height=8}
imdb_sample %>%
  mutate_all( ~ifelse(. %in% c('\\N', ""), NA, .) ) %>%
  mutate_at("isAdult", ~ifelse(. %in% c('0', '1'), ., NA) ) %>%
  plot_missing(percent = T)
```
